column5: This is the perfect cozy chic condo for a weekend getaway at the beach. Recently renovated with all new furniture and appliances. Breathtaking views from the 9th floor, updated 2 bedroom 2 bath. Huge balconies spanning the unit. On site 24 hour staff at desk Located on the seawall with direct access to a newly renovated beach. Amazing pool available as well as tennis courts. Less than 10 minute drive to Schlitterbahn, Moody Gardens, Pleasure Pier and other great local attractions!
column8: Sea La Vie - Ocean View Condo By The Sea Condos
